title: Swedish magazine typeface
content:
Hi everybody at Typophile.

I’ve been trying to identify the headline font used in the Swedish magazine “På stan” for a while. I tried the “what the font”- search engine at myfonts after separating the letters a bit but came up with nothing. I have attached an image showing various headlines copied from their website (pastan.nu).

I’m now begging you guys for help, hoping you might know what typeface is used.

// Oskar

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [headlines.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051228/http:/typophile.com/files/headlines.jpg) | 58.57 KB |

 [‹ LAN Chile old logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051228/http:/typophile.com/node/50488 "Go to previous forum topic") [Nickelodeon ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051228/http:/typophile.com/node/50489 "Go to next forum topic")
author: oskar

comments.content: Yep youre right, thanks alot! I really appreciate it.
